page.title: 11FAVOURITE TV PROGRAMME
page.content: "Street Hawk" is a programme on{ITV}it is on{THURSDAYS'S}at 7:30 there is a man called Jessie Marc and Norman Tuttle.Street Hawk is a{motor bike,} not an ordinary motor bike.It has lasers and machine guns that come out of the bike.Norman owns "Street Hawk".It is ridden by Jessie Marc.The bike is incredible,with a laser beam and an ejector seat.Jessie is a cycle cop in{America.}Norman has a{computer} which controls the bike.Norman types in a code and it opens a door.Jessie gets in his suit to ride it always because people could recognise him and know who he was.He has a black helmet through which he can see how fast he is going because it showes the speed on the helmet.It can go over 300 mph on hyperthrust.Jessie fights crime all around because the computers map can spot crime.
